roleset.name: dig for something, creating tunnels in
roleset.note: TUNNEL-V NOTES: Frame created by Kev (from tunnel.01-v)
TUNNELING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tunneling.01-j)

example.name: Mega Engineering!
example.text: Engineers tunneled through layers of rock and sediment to build the chunnel.
example.arg: through layers of rock and sediment

example.name: True story
example.text: Thieves in Brazil tunneled through dirt for three months to steal money from a bank's vaults.
example.arg: to steal money from a bank's vault

example.name: modified google search example
example.text: His research work on various aspects of tunnelling through the difficult ground conditions of the Himilayas for silver deposits was widely appreciated internationally.
example.arg: through the difficult ground conditions of the Himilayas
